name: Trying to do better
description:
Trying to do better is a game where a girl by the name of Mia Ellington has recently moved away from home and is currently facing life solo, the story progresses as Mia learns how to cope with life through fighting and learning new skills to help make it throughout the week. a harsh life makes our protagonist manifest game-like dreams to attempt to cope with her real-life situations. what appears to be just a classic dungeon crawler is really a story of hardship and pain. will Mia make it through an entire month on her own? or succumb to the effects of the real world...

Dev Team:

Katherine Ervin- artist.

Victor Robles- coder/designer.

Jake Fusco- coder/designer.

Amariah Harper- artist.
